title: What is the mass of 1 mol of CH2Cl2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Look up the molar mass of each atom in the formula: Calculate the mass of each in 1 mol CH2Cl2 C = 1* 12.011 g/mol CH2Cl2 H = 2*1.008 = 2.016 g /mol CH2Cl2 Cl = 2*35.453 = 70.906 g /mol CH2Cl2 Total molar mass CH2Cl2 = 12.011+2.016 + 70.906 = 84.933 g/mol
